title: Last Sundays night frollick being a very true account of three eminent citizens of London, who, by a strange mistake, unfortunately pickt up their own wives, last Sunday evening, in St. James's Park, whom they treated with a supper very splendidly, at an eminent tavern, near Charing-Cross : vvith the manner of their discovery, and of the great confusion of the whole company thereupon : being indeed, not only a very pleasant, but also a true relation.
